org.spf4j.concurrent

Class ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.concurrent.ContextPropagatingExecutorService
      • org.spf4j.concurrent.ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executor, ExecutorService, ScheduledExecutorService, Wrapper<ExecutorService>

    public final class ContextPropagatingScheduledExecutorService
extends ContextPropagatingExecutorService
implements ScheduledExecutorService
    A Execution context propagating Scheduled executor.
    Author:
    Zoltan Farkas
